posts.post_content:
Helmar with S81 checklist-$80.00

Turkey Red with first series T3 and T9 checklist-$100.00

Generic Piedmont and Hassan-$10.00 each

All prices postpaid. New York residents must add sales tax. Check or money order only. As always, "I'll take it" trumps all negotiations or requests for additional information. Please reserve via email [url]edhans@monkberry.com[/url]. Thank you for looking.
